short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: tab vacuum that sucks up all your tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blinky the Vacuum sucks your tabs and puts them in its stomach! Blinkytab is a simple chrome extension that when activated by the user, allows for the user to pull their open tab data (URLs and titles) and post it as a timestamped list on an ordered feed, providing a multi user social media-lite experience of sharing tabs. The user can enter a username at will, making the feed pseudanonymous by user choice.
